head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths COLEMAN, DR. LESTER E. JR.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths COLEMAN, DR. LESTER E. JR.

block.p: COLEMAN-Dr. Lester E. Jr., age 69. Beloved husband of Kathleen A. (nee Deak). Dear father of Robert Scott (wife Paula) and Kenneth John (wife Janice). Loving grandfather of Heather A. Pettit (husband Andrew), Gregory S., Andrew G., Elaine W. and the late Christopher Ryan. Dear son of the late Lester E., Sr. and Ethel A. (nee Miller). Dear brother of the late Dr. John F. (wife Cynthia). Dearest uncle of Regina Milan (husband Fred), Victoria Ellinger (husband David), J. Anthony and great-uncle of Alexandria, Daniela, and Lauren. Retired Chairman and CEO of The Lubrizol Corporation. Captain U.S. Air Force Veteran. Family suggests contributions may be made in Lester's memory to Boy Scouts of America Western Reserve Council or to the University Ireland Cancer Center, University Hospitals of Cleveland, c/o Lung Cancer Research, 2074 Abington Rd, Cleveland, OH 44106. Mass of Christian Burial Wednesday, October 25, 2000, at 11 AM, at St. Joan of Arc Church, 496 East Washington St, Chagrin Falls. Interment Crown Hill Cemetery. Family will receive friends to pay tribute and celebrate the life of Les at DeJohn-Flynn-Mylott Funeral Home of South Euclid, 4600 Mayfield Rd. (just east of Green Rd.), Tuesday, 2-5 and 6-9 PM. For directions please visit www.DeJohnFuneral.com
